keyMoments.title: Law Declares the New Era of Supernovas
keyMoments.description: Captain Trafalgar Law declares that the Eleven Supernovas will lead the new era, positioning the Heart Pirates as part of the generation that will reshape the world.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Heart Pirates' role in the coming upheaval of the world order.

keyMoments.title: Law Defeats Vergo and Destroys SAD Production
keyMoments.description: Law demonstrates the Heart Pirates' power by defeating Vergo and destroying Doflamingo's SAD operation.
keyMoments.significance: Major victory for the Heart Pirates against Doflamingo's organization.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a fur hat similar to Law's, with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Vergo Defeated and SAD Production Destroyed
keyMoments.description: The Donquixote Pirates suffer a major setback as their executive Vergo is defeated and their SAD manufacturing operation is completely destroyed by Law.
keyMoments.significance: Critical blow to the Donquixote Pirates' SMILE business with Kaido and their overall power structure.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with sunglasses and a crown-like symbol above it, with crossed bones behind

keyMoments.title: Smoker Defeated by Vergo
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Smoker is brutally defeated by Vergo, who is revealed to be a traitor within the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the corruption within the Marines and Smoker's determination despite being outmatched.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Helps a Pirate
keyMoments.description: Smoker makes the difficult decision to help Law, a pirate, by returning his heart to enable his victory over the traitor Vergo.
keyMoments.significance: Shows G-5's leader prioritizing true justice over rigid Marine doctrine.

jollyRoger.description: Marine seagull symbol with G-5 designation
